name: You Summoned Me?
description:
You are a cat. Make shapes by moving the ball of yarn. What will you summon?

Use the arrow keys to move the cat and push the ball around. When you've made your desired shape by connecting the string, press the spacebar. Enjoy!

Team Members:

Chandler Miller (Audio Engineer)- Used 2 hrs

Madison Maxwell(Visual Designer, Game Developer) - Used 3 hrs

*Game has unexpected bugs that weren't present in the Unity Program but it's too late to fix it for the game jam. to find all 4 possible summoning options, please start the game over by reloading the page. Thanks for your understanding!*
